LLRF expert GUI main module¶

Main module to run the Low Level Radio Frequency expert taurus GUI.

llrfgui.main.create_application()[source]¶

Create the application and return an (application, taurusgui) tuple.

Returns:Tuple compose by a TaurusApplication and a TaurusGUI
Return type:tuple
llrfgui.main.hide_toolbars(gui)[source]¶

Hide unnecessary toolbars.

Parameters:gui (TaurusGui) – TaurusGUI to hide toolbars
llrfgui.main.run()[source]¶

Run LLRF expert GUI
